mapper.insert: insert into comment (commentId, postId, comment, userId) values (#{commentId}, #{postId}, #{comment}, #{userId});
mapper.delete: delete from likey_comment where commentId = #{commentId} and userId = #{userId};
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likey_comment WHERE commentId = #{commentId};

select comment.commentId, likey_comment.userId from likey_comment inner join comment on comment.commentId = likey_comment.commentId where comment.postId = #{postId} and likey_comment.userId = #{userId};
